argument.name: Thread_List
argument.description: A CR-LF delimited list of all running threads. "Main" will always be listed as this is the main thread that runs the Alpha Anywhere software.

page.discussion: For internal use only. The THREAD_ENUM() function returns a list of the names of running threads. No user interface related commands are allowed in a thread. Using any command that attempts to create or manipulate any type of user interface from within a thread will cause Alpha Anywhere to hang. Examples of such invalid functions include debug() , ui_*, StatusBar.*, ControlPanel.*, trace.*, etc. .
